page.title: 03A FAMILY HOLIDAY.
page.content: {Our family holiday}is an economical one, we tow our own touring caravan behind the family car. {The caravan}sleeps 4 people and is very comfortable being double glazed and well insulated.It weighs 10.3 cwt. and is 14ft. long.We have a toilet compartment and so can use any site with a water supply. Bottled gas is used for cooking but we also take a barbecue for outdoor use when the weather permits. A 12 volt battery is used for lighting and also powers the portable T.V. We take{games}such as Swingball, Scrabble, card games and Ludo. Buckets spades and fishing nets are a must for seaside activities. We prefer to take our holidays at quiet seaside resorts or in the New Forest. The cost per night for a family of four is approx. Â£5.00.
